title: Pixel 3 - Dead hard buttons
content:
My pixel 3 volume and power buttons were not working yesterday.

I thought it might be a software issue so I waited for the phone to die to have it restart.

Now the power button still is not working so I can't power the device on.

I am looking for a way to boot the device via and adb command or something similar.

When I run adb devices it does not show up.

Just trying to back up some of the data before I get a new phone.
